ComicInfo.Series: Beware the Witch's Shadow: Night Frights
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-30 07:46:59. [Issue ID 2531936]
ComicInfo.Summary: The wisecracking Witch is back! If you find yourself in a cabin deep in the woods it may already be too late. The Witch welcomes visitors with tales of terror before stealing their wicked souls. This new issue of frights has stories that will chill your blood and boil your brain. Reserve a copy and read her tales...but beware...if you aren't careful, you'll be carved up by her sharp tongue and fed to the beasties... Beware the Witch's Shadow "Night Frights" comes with three cover editions - Main by Puis Calzada (Hatchet), "Heads" Variant by Dan Parsons (Harpy), and a Racy edition also by Parsons.
